price: We have sent you with the truth as a bearer of glad tidings and a warner. There has never been any community except that a warner came to it[11].
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗاۚ وَإِن مِّنۡ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٞ
footnotes: [11] Among all prophets and messengers, only twenty-five are mentioned in the Qur’an.
